## DynamicControlGroup interface

Describes a group of controls that make up an object in the form model

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DynamicControlGroup<TForm, TFormState = unknown> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [controlGroupComponent?](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrolgroup.controlgroupcomponent.md) | Type&lt;[ControlGroupComponent](./dynamic-forms.controlgroupcomponent.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> A custom control group component for displaying the group |
|  [controls](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrolgroup.controls.md) | ([DynamicControl](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrol.md)<!-- -->&lt;TForm, TFormState&gt; \| [DynamicControlGroup](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrolgroup.md)<!-- -->&lt;TForm, TFormState&gt;)\[\] | The controls belonging to the group |
|  [disabledControls?](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrolgroup.disabledcontrols.md) | [DisabledControls](./dynamic-forms.disabledcontrols.md)<!-- -->&lt;TForm&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> A map of controls that should be disabled by default |
|  [label?](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrolgroup.label.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> A visual label displayed above the group on the rendered form |
|  [name?](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrolgroup.name.md) | Extract&lt;keyof TForm, string&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The name of the control group |
|  [styling?](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrolgroup.styling.md) | [DynamicControlGroupStyling](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrolgroupstyling.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Custom stylings for the group |
|  [type](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrolgroup.type.md) | "group" | The type of control |
